feed.title: Dynamic Brain & Memory Lab
feed.subtitle: The official website of the Brain & Memory Lab at the National University of Singapore (NUS), led by Principal Investigator Dr. Jia-Hou Poh.

entry.title: Motivational states, neuromodulatory systems, and adaptive memory. Read Dr. Poh’s review paper on the Annual Reviews of Psychology!

link.title: Motivational states, neuromodulatory systems, and adaptive memory. Read Dr. Poh’s review paper on the Annual Reviews of Psychology!

entry.content:
How motivational states engender distinct neural contexts for adaptive memory? Find out by reading "Motivation as Neural Context for Adaptive Learning and Memory Formation" on Annual Reviews of Psychology!

Congrats Dr. Poh and Dr. Adcock!
entry.summary: How motivational states engender distinct neural contexts for adaptive memory? Find out by reading "Motivation as Neural Context for Adaptive Learning and Memory Formation" on Annual Reviews of Psychology!

entry.title: The dynamic brain and memory lab is live!

link.title: The dynamic brain and memory lab is live!
